ability.everlastingabilities.bug_pheromo: Makes hostile arthropods neutral to the user
ability.everlastingabilities.soulsteal.i: Grants the user attacks some life-steal
ability.everlastingabilities.sundering.i: Applies the inverse of resistance to surrounding entities
ability.everlastingabilities.ancient_kno: Increases experienced gained from mob kills
Regenerate mana at a faster rate
ability.everlastingabilities.shielding.i: Decreases damage taken by a flat amount
ability.everlastingabilities.freezing.in: Surrounding entities freeze as if in powdered snow
ability.everlastingabilities.blasting.in: Causes surrounding entities to explode after a certain duration
ability.everlastingabilities.enderferenc: Makes surrounding entities unable to teleport
ability.everlastingabilities.static_char: Causes lightning to attack surrounding entities after a certain duration
ability.everlastingabilities.anti_gravit: Resist the force of gravity, decreasing the effects of gravity on yourself
ability.everlastingabilities.reach_dista: Increase the block placement and mining reach range
ability.everlastingabilities.frost_walke: Turns the water to ice as you walk near it
ability.everlastingabilities.waterwalkin: Prevents you from sinking down through the waters surface
ability.everlastingabilities.snow_walker: Leaves a trail of snow behind you when you walk
ability.everlastingabilities.magnetism.i: Pulls items and xp towards you in a range of 8 blocks per level
ability.everlastingabilities.gravity.inf: Increases the force of gravity on yourself
ability.everlastingabilities.butterfinge: Chance to drop items while moving or attacking
ability.everlastingabilities.sculk_affin: Prevents the user from causing vibrations
